EmailTemplate.subject: Upcoming Event: Hadoop Summit June 3-5
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Global Field Operations Team,
Just a quick event update - Pivotal will be exhibiting as a Silver sponsor at the Hadoop Summit <http://hadoopsummit.org/san-jose/> next week in San Jose (June 3-5th). We will have an 8’x8’ kiosk in the exhibit hall and participate in a 10 minute community showcase presentation.
Overview:
- Pivotal is in Booth #S32
- Community Showcase Topic: "Easily develop, deploy, and manage real-time big data apps"
- Date/Time/Location: June 5th @ 12:45pm @ Exhibit Hall Stage, Pivotal Presenter: Tushar Pednekar, Principal Enterprise Architect, Field Engineering
- Show Guide <https://docs.google.com/a/gopivotal.com/document/d/1wSznUjym7FXF269pEJVElBj3XxfQ6hXTkfjodJJfM18/edit?usp=sharing> - Booth Duty Schedule <https://docs.google.com/a/gopivotal.com/spreadsheets/d/1V1Idw4sKiaGpD0fUyLPY0pMPJpSu0krPD1Kq8WzhCYs/edit?usp=sharing>
Our sponsorship came with a 20% discount code for All Access Passes <http://hadoopsummit.org/san-jose/register/> that is good for unlimited use for Pivotal employees only. Please use code: 14Disc20SponZ
Sincerely,
Pivotal Marketing
